attributes.action: Ask the High Street Banks in the UK to introduce a seven day charge free window for none business account holders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It will not be long before all banks will introduce charges on current accounts. This means that the banks will be the first to benefit from the wages of working people as there are few if any ways of wages being paid to workers other than the banking system.These charges will penalise low paid workers. A seven day charge free window would enable account holders to manage their accounts in such a way to avoid such penalties
